name: V: Infected
description:
V. You have been infected. But you don't die, or turn into a mindless, flesh-eating monster, like the rest. Yet, every time you fall, you rise again, stronger, faster, deadlier.

Can you survive the nights full of flesheaters, V?

----------------------------------------

Fourth game of the Ludum Historica Project, based on the 4th Ludum Dare Jam theme "Infection"
